data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Kushtia, Khulna, Bangladesh.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kushtia, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Kushtia to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Kushtia.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Kushtia, Khulna, Bangladesh. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Peshakar people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Peshakar people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Peshakar people is yours.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Kushtia, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Kushtia that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kushtia, Khulna, Bangladesh has a population of 1,946,800.

We estimate Kushtia has 2,439 people who might know Jesus, 5,840 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,938,521 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Kushtia, Khulna, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
